header.title: Artifex.AI Studio Pro
header.subtitle: An AI-powered creative suite to generate compelling product descriptions and visualize ideas with detailed storyboards and video clips.

tooltips.exportProjectFile: Export current project to a file

inputForm.keyFeaturesPlaceholder: e.g., 4K resolution, portable, long battery life...

storyboardForm.ideaPlaceholder: e.g., A cinematic trailer for a personal flying car in a cyberpunk city.
storyboardForm.oneByOneDescription: Recommended. Generate text first, then create images individually to save costs.
storyboardForm.costWarning: This will generate all {{count}} images at once. Estimated cost: ${{cost}}.

storyboardSettings.title: Advanced Settings
storyboardSettings.videoNote: Video generation is an experimental feature and may take several minutes per clip.

storyboardDisplay.title: Generated Storyboard
storyboardDisplay.generatingScenes:
Generating scene descriptions...
This may take a moment.
storyboardDisplay.checkPlan: Please check your plan or try again later.
storyboardDisplay.generatingClipHint: This may take a few minutes.

detailedModal.title: Expand Scene
detailedModal.loadingMessage: Generating new detailed shots and images...

apiKeyInstructions.title: API Key Required
apiKeyInstructions.welcome: Welcome to Artifex.AI Studio! To get started, you need to set up your Google Gemini API key.
apiKeyInstructions.howTo: How to get and set your API key:
apiKeyInstructions.step1: Go to {{link}} and create your API key.
apiKeyInstructions.step2: In your project environment, set the {{apiKey}} variable to your newly created key.
apiKeyInstructions.step3: Refresh this page. The application will automatically pick it up.
apiKeyInstructions.disclaimer: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and is never sent to our servers.

sampleModal.productSearchPlaceholder: Search products by name or feature...

galleryModal.title: Project Gallery
galleryModal.noProjects: You have no saved projects yet.

mediaArt.selectImageHint: Upload your own or choose a classic painting.

mediaArtStyles.dataCompositionDesc: Data visualization, glitch, binary patterns. (Ryoji Ikeda style)
mediaArtStyles.digitalNatureDesc: Interactive particle systems: flowers, light. (teamLab style)
mediaArtStyles.aiDataSculptureDesc: Fluid, organic data visualization. (Refik Anadol style)
mediaArtStyles.lightAndSpaceDesc: Strobes, grids, structural light patterns. (NONOTAK style)
mediaArtStyles.kineticMirrorsDesc: Moving sculptures using reflected, fragmented images.
mediaArtStyles.generativeBotanyDesc: Algorithmically grown, surrealistic plants and flowers.
mediaArtStyles.quantumPhantasmDesc: Uncertain, shimmering visual effects inspired by quantum physics.
mediaArtStyles.architecturalProjectionDesc: Deconstructed, reprojected images onto geometric structures.

visualArt.title: Visual Art Generator
visualArt.instruction: Provide text, an image, or both to generate a video.

imageUploader.cta: Click to upload an image or video

imageTransition.title: Media to Video Transition
imageTransition.instruction: Provide start and end media (image or video) to generate a video transitioning between them.
imageTransition.promptPlaceholder: Describe how the transition should look, e.g., 'a smooth morph', 'dissolve into particles', 'a cinematic fade'...
imageTransition.errorStartEndImage: Both start and end media are required to generate a video.

morph.title: Simple Morph
morph.description: A direct, smooth crossfade and morph between the two images.

physicsMorph.title: Physics Morph
physicsMorph.description: Objects in the scene animate with realistic physics while transitioning.

particleDissolve.title: Particle Dissolve
particleDissolve.description: The first image dissolves into magical particles that reform into the second.

cinematicZoom.title: Cinematic Zoom
cinematicZoom.description: Uses slow pans and zooms to create a dramatic, film-like transition.

fluidPaint.title: Fluid Paint
fluidPaint.description: Transforms the image as if it were a swirling, wet oil painting.

standard.label: Veo 2.0 (Standard)
standard.description: The best all-around model for general purpose video generation.

cinematic.label: Veo 2.1 (Cinematic)
cinematic.description: Optimized for photorealistic, high-fidelity, and film-like results.

animator.label: Veo Animator
animator.description: Specialized for animation styles like anime, claymation, and cartoons.

fx.label: Veo FX
fx.description: Excels at generating dynamic visual effects like particles, fire, and fluids.

lite.label: Veo Lite
lite.description: A faster, lighter model ideal for quick previews and drafts.

wandererSeaFog.title: Wanderer above the Sea of Fog

aSundayAfternoon.title: A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte

anatomyLesson.title: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp

errors.descriptionGeneration: Failed to generate description. Please try again.
errors.storyboardGeneration: Failed to generate storyboard. Please check your input and try again.
errors.sceneExpansion: Failed to expand scene. Please try again.
errors.mediaArtGeneration: Failed to generate media art scenes. Please try again.
errors.visualArtGeneration: Failed to generate visual art video. Please try again.
errors.imageTransitionGeneration: Failed to generate transition video. Please try again.
errors.projectImport: Failed to import project. The file may be invalid or corrupted.

confirmations.videoGeneration: Video generation is an expensive operation and can take several minutes. Once started, please do not close or refresh this page to avoid potential duplicate charges.
confirmations.pageLeave: A video is currently being generated. Leaving this page may result in incomplete generation and potential duplicate charges if you restart. Are you sure you want to leave?
